 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוַת‎</span>] **verb** ==be bent, crooked== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Pi\`el, Nithpa\`el; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַוֵּית‎</span> Pa\`el; compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***deceive*** [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>3008</sup>); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוְּתָ֑נִי‎</span> [[Job.19.6|Job 19:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוְּתוֺ‎</span> [[Eccl.7.13|Eccl 7:13]] 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוְּתוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.78|Ps 119:78]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעַוֵּת‎</span> [[Ps.146.9|Ps 146:9]]; [[Job.8.3|Job 8:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעַוֶּתֿ‎</span> v[[Job.8.3|Job 8:3]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעַוֵּת‎</span> [[Amos.8.5|Amos 8:5]]; [[Lam.3.22|Lam 3:22]] — 

**1. a.** ***make crooked*** = falsify, scales [[Amos.8.5|Amos 8:5]] ***pervert*** justice (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁפָּט‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶדֶק‎</span>) [[Job.8.3|Job 8:3]] (twice in verse); [[Job.34.12|Job 34:12]] (all God subject); with accusative of person ***subvert*** (i.e. deprive of justice), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָדָם בְּרִיבוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְע‎</span> [[Lam.3.36|Lam 3:36]], compare [[Ps.119.78|Ps 119:78]] so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוְּתָ֑נִי‎</span> [[Job.19.6|Job 19:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject). 

**2.** ***bend, make crooked***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ רְשָׁעִים‎</span> [[Ps.146.9|Ps 146:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject); in general [[Eccl.7.13|Eccl 7:13]] (God subject; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקֵּן‎</span>). **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֻוָּת‎</span> [[Eccl.1.15|Eccl 1:15]] ***what is bent*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּקֹן‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְעַוְּתוּ‎</span> [[Eccl.12.3|Eccl 12:3]] ***and*** the strong men ***bend themselves***.
